title: Best of The Herd
itunes:title: Best of The Herd
description:
Colin addresses the growing debate around Matthew Stafford's career resume and if he's a lock for the Hall of Fame after finally winning a Super Bowl. He discusses Kyler Murray addressing reports about his attitude at the end of the season and what he has in common with the all-time great quarterbacks in the league. He gives his thoughts on Rams head coach Sean McVay potentially retiring and Tom Brady considering a return to the NFL. Plus, NFL reporter Mike Silver joins the show to provide insight on the Murray situation and putting Aaron Donald's greatness into perspective. 

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
